question: Guadalajara International Book Fair (GIBF), which is in news recently, is scheduled to be held in which of the following countries?
explanation: India has been designated as the Guest of Honour at the 33rd Guadalajara International Book Fair (GIBF) 2019 in Mexico, which is scheduled to be organized from Nov 30 to Dec 8. The book fair will be the largest book fair in the Spanish speaking world. The dedicated India pavilion at the fair will showcase over 35 Indian authors and artists, along with 15 publishing houses. Ancient and rare manuscripts including \"Mahabharata\" and \"Ramayana\" will be put on exhibition, along with photo books, handicrafts and paintings. India\'s participation at the fair will also include a film festival showing movies like \"Dangal\", \"Chennai Express\" and \"Omkara\".
